pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis semantic similarity between HPO terms and HPO-based phenotypic similarity between genes and between diseases. // This package implements multiple similarity measures for HPO terms, genes and diseases. It is aiming at phenotype analysis for gene sets and disease sets. Functions for HPO enrichment analysis is also provided. The disease-term and gene-term associations contained in this version are based on the official HPO data released in January 2014.
